About.paragraph: How it all started: Srila Prabhupada, the founder-acharya of ISKCON, heard a strange combination of a screaming child and growling of dogs. When he looked in the direction of the sound, Srila Prabhupada was horrified at the sight of a child fighting with dogs to collect food remnants from the pile of leaf plates thrown into the garbage bin after meal. Srila Prabhupada was deeply saddened at such a sight. The child's trouble and tribulation for survival strongly pained him. With deep compassion from his heart and tears rolling down his cheeks, Srila Prabhupada ordered, No one should go hungry within a ten-mile radius of any ISKCON center.
About.paragraph1: Taking inspiration from this compassionate instruction, ISKCON centers feed the hungry with hot, hygienic, wholesome and nutritious meals prepared from fully equipped, hygienic, high-tech kitchen Recently, ISKCON has encountered a severe issue connected with hunger. In India, about 8,80,000 children aged under 5 years die every year due to malnutrition which is highest in the world. The malnutrition issues are prevalent in tribal areas where balanced diets are a luxury. The poor families in the remote areas find it hard to get a full meal a day. Poverty is the root cause of malnutrition amongst tribal children.

Testimonials.text: "Nothing can be more gratifying than being able to provide food to someone. By partnering with ISKCON in feeding thousands of labourers amidst COVID-19 pandemic, Team Adani Foundation has lived by its core Gandhian philosophy of Trusteeship."
Testimonials.name: Gautam Adani

Testimonials.text: "The team was very supportive and kept me motivated .A charity that brings smiles to the faces, is a noble deed which is initiated by ISKCON food donation for child and poor."
Testimonials.name: Ajith Kumar

Testimonials.text: "Awesome initiative. We appreciate ISKCON for the Food for Child Initiative, which has created this amazing platform for us to contribute to the feeding and educating underprivileged tribal brilliant young children. We are really happy with the procedure, transparency, and clarity offered by society."
Testimonials.name: Pratik Rao

Contact.address: Bhisma Dept , ISKCON, Hare Krishna Land, Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400049
